name: Click Park: Idle Building Game
description:
Your Dream Amusement Park is a Click Away!
The Best in Idle Theme Park Clicker Games!

Click to keep Building Attractions, Click to Attract Visitors, and Click to Rake in Loads of Money!

FEATURES:
•CREATE YOUR OWN THEME PARK – The world’s craziest amusement park is just a few clicks away!
•EARN SKY-HIGH PROFITS – Build lucrative roller coasters, attract swarms of visitors, and click your way to billions!
•UNLOCK ULTIMATE UPGRADES – Multiply your profits with hundreds of upgrades and go from basic kids’ rides to towering rollercoasters!
•PLAY THRILLING MINI-GAMES – Earn prizes!
•DRESS FOR SUCCESS – Hire dozens of different mascots – from the gallant Sir Ridesalot to Thrillasaurus Rex – to be the face of your park and earn unique bonuses!
•BECOME A TYCOON - Start your theme park adventure small and build your roller coaster empire to become the biggest!
•TAP TAP TAP - Keep tapping to earn gold, or play idle to continue to build your empire!

Tired of being a Miner, a Factory or City Builder, a Farming Tycoon or some other type of boring Capitalist?
Find a new Adventure and Download the Funnest in Free Clicker Amusement Park Idle Games on the App Store!
